statements: SELECT * FROM SoilQualityData WHERE soil_ph > 6.5;
SELECT id, date, moisture_level FROM SoilQualityData WHERE moisture_level < 50;
SELECT date, organic_matter_content FROM SoilQualityData WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM SoilQualityData ORDER BY moisture_level DESC;
SELECT id, soil_ph FROM SoilQualityData WHERE soil_ph < 7.0;
SELECT id, date, soil_ph FROM SoilQualityData WHERE moisture_level > 0.5 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM SoilQualityData WHERE soil_ph < 6.5 AND organic_matter_content > 3 ORDER BY organic_matter_content ASC, date DESC;
SELECT id, date, moisture_level, organic_matter_content FROM SoilQualityData WHERE soil_ph BETWEEN 6.0 AND 7.0 ORDER BY moisture_level DESC;
SELECT date, soil_ph FROM SoilQualityData WHERE moisture_level < 0.3 OR organic_matter_content < 2.5 ORDER BY date ASC, soil_ph DESC;
SELECT id, date, soil_ph, moisture_level, organic_matter_content FROM SoilQualityData WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' AND soil_ph > 7.2 ORDER BY date ASC, moisture_level DESC
SELECT * FROM SoilQualityData WHERE pH_level > 5.5;
SELECT soil_id, moisture_level FROM SoilQualityData WHERE moisture_level < 20;
SELECT practice_name, recommended_fertilizer FROM FarmingPractices WHERE practice_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM SoilQualityData ORDER BY pH_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM FarmingPractices WHERE optimal_season = 'Spring';
SELECT * FROM SoilQualityData WHERE pH_level > 6.5 ORDER BY soil_id DESC
SELECT soil_id, moisture_level FROM SoilQualityData WHERE moisture_level < 0.3
SELECT practice_name, recommended_fertilizer FROM FarmingPractices WHERE optimal_season = 'Spring'
SELECT soil_id, pH_level, moisture_level FROM SoilQualityData WHERE pH_level BETWEEN 5.5 AND 7.5
SELECT * FROM SoilQualityData ORDER BY pH_level ASC
SELECT * FROM SoilSamples;
SELECT sample_id, date_taken, ph_level FROM SoilSamples ORDER BY date_taken DESC;
SELECT * FROM FarmingPractices WHERE efficiency_rating > 3;
SELECT sample_id, ph_level, nitrogen_level, organic_matter_content FROM SoilAnalysisResults WHERE nitrogen_level < 0.5;
SELECT result_id, sample_id, ph_level, nitrogen_level FROM SoilAnalysisResults ORDER BY ph_level;
SELECT * FROM SoilSamples ORDER BY date_taken DESC, nitrogen_level ASC;
SELECT sample_id, location_id, ph_level, nitrogen_level FROM SoilSamples WHERE ph_level > 6.5;

SELECT s.sample_id, s.location_id, s.date_taken, s.ph_level, sa.ph_level AS result_ph_level FROM SoilSamples s INNER JOIN SoilAnalysisResults sa ON s.sample_id = sa.sample_id ORDER BY s.date_taken ASC, sa.ph_level DESC;
SELECT s.sample_id, s.location_id, s.date_taken, s.ph_level, p.practice_name, p.recommended_season FROM SoilSamples s LEFT JOIN FarmingPractices p ON s.location_id = p.practice_id;

SELECT s.sample_id, s.location_id, s.date_taken, s.ph_level, sa.ph_level AS result_ph_level, sar.organic_matter_content FROM SoilSamples s INNER JOIN SoilAnalysisResults sa ON s.sample_id = sa.sample_id LEFT JOIN SoilAnalysisResults sar ON s.sample_id = sar.sample_id WHERE s.ph_level < 7.0 ORDER BY sa.nitrogen_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM soil_samples;
SELECT sample_id, sample_date, pH FROM soil_samples ORDER BY sample_date DESC;
SELECT location_id, region, climate FROM locations WHERE soil_type='Clay';
SELECT sample_id, nitrogen_level, phosphorus_level FROM soil_samples WHERE pH > 6.5;
SELECT sr.sample_id, sr.optimal_condition, fp.practice_name FROM analysis_results sr JOIN farming_practices fp ON sr.practice_id = fp.practice_id;
SELECT * FROM soil_samples;
SELECT sample_id, location_id, sample_date FROM soil_samples WHERE pH > 7;
SELECT sample_id, nitrogen_level, phosphorus_level FROM soil_samples WHERE nitrogen_level > 0.5 AND phosphorus_level < 0.3;
SELECT s.sample_id, s.sample_date, l.region, l.soil_type FROM soil_samples s JOIN locations l ON s.location_id = l.location_id;
SELECT a.analysis_id, a.optimal_condition, p.practice_name FROM analysis_results a JOIN farming_practices p ON a.practice_id = p.practice_id;
SELECT * FROM soil_quality_data;
SELECT id, date, soil_ph FROM soil_quality_data ORDER BY soil_ph DESC;
SELECT * FROM crop_data WHERE yield_per_hectare > 5;
SELECT farm_name, total_area FROM farm_data WHERE total_area < 100;
SELECT farm_name, location FROM farm_data WHERE soil_condition = 'Good';
SELECT * FROM soil_quality_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM crop_data WHERE yield_per_hectare > 5;
SELECT farm_name, location, total_area FROM farm_data WHERE soil_condition = 'Excellent';
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, harvest_date, yield_per_hectare FROM crop_data WHERE yield_per_hectare <= 10 ORDER BY yield_per_hectare DESC;
SELECT farm_name, location, total_area, soil_condition FROM farm_data WHERE location LIKE '%California%' AND soil_condition LIKE '%Good%' ORDER BY total_area;
